Sheet1.1: The fields "Ime i prezime" and "Ulica i broj" are not working properly - order is not successful when using valid inputs in the fields
After filling out the fields using lower boundary values, and clicking on the "Narucujem" button, the error messages are displayed

Sheet1.Column3: Step description
Open Google Chrome browser
Navigate to www.pcpress.rs/prodavnica
Tick the checkbox next to the "Kupujem" button in the "Godisnja pretplata na casopis PC (11 brojeva)" section
Click on the "Kupujem" button in the "Godisnja pretplata na casopis PC (11 brojeva)" section
In the field "Ime i prezime" enter valid inputs (Q a)
In the field "Ulica i broj" enter valid inputs (C 1)
In the "Postanski broj" field enter valid inputs (11000)
In the "Grad" field enter valid inputs (Beograd
In the "Telefon" field enter valid inputs (066123456)
In the "Email" field enter valid inputs (abc@gmail.com)
Click on the "Narucujem" button

Sheet1.1: Order was successfully made and, and the "Predracun" page is displayed

Ordering was unsuccessful: A new page was opened with an error message displayed: "Greska! Molimo Vas unesite ispravno Ime i prezime.
Greska! Molimo Vas unesite ispravnu Ulicu i Broj.
Greska! Molimo proverite sva polja - Povratak na Vasu narudzbenicu "
The fields "Ime i prezime" and "Ulica i broj" are not working properly - order is not successful when using valid inputs in the fields
After filling out the fields using lower boundary values, and clicking on the "Narucujem" button, the error messages are displayed

Sheet1.Column3: Step description
Open Google Chrome browser
Navigate to https://www.pcpress.rs/prodavnica/
Click on the checkbox next to "KUPUJEM" button in bottom right corner of "Polugodisnja pretplata na casopis PC (6) brojeva" section
Clear the "Kolicina" field
In the "Kolicina" field enter valid input (100)
Click on the "KUPUJEM" button in the "Polugodisnja pretplata na casopis PC (6 brojeva)" section
In the field "Ime i prezime" enter valid inputs (M le)
In the field "Ulica i broj" enter valid inputs (w /?)
In the field "Postanski broj" enter valid inputs (37000)
In the field "Grad" enter valid inputs (Krusevac)
In the field "Telefon" enter valid inputs (0661234567)
In the field "Email" enter valid inputs (milos1+qa@yahoo.com)
In the field "Napomena" enter valid inputs (As3@ ?)
Click on the "Narucujem" button

Sheet1.1: Order was successfully made and, and the "Predracun" page is displayed

Ordering was unsuccessful: A new page was opened with an error message displayed: "Greska! Molimo Vas unesite ispravno Ime i prezime.
Greska! Molimo Vas unesite ispravnu Ulicu i Broj.
Greska! Molimo proverite sva polja - Povratak na Vasu narudzbenicu "
"KUPUJEM" button of the "Knjiga Office i Windows na radnom mestu" doesn't work properly - when using invalid input in the "Kolicina" field, "Narudzbenica" form is opened
After entering invalid input in the "Kolicina" field of the "Knjiga Office I Windows na radnom mestu" and clicking "KUPUJEM" button, "Narudzbenica" form is opened, instead of error message displaying

Sheet1.Column3: Step description
Open Google Chrome browser
Navigate to https://www.pcpress.rs/prodavnica/
Tick the checkbox of the "Knjiga Office i Windows na radnom mestu" section
Clear the "Kolicina" field
In the "Kolicina" field enter invalid inputs (0)
Click on the "KUPUJEM" button

Sheet1.1: An error message is displayed "Greška! U izabranom artiklu Knjiga Office i Windows upisana količina mora biti broj od 1 do 100"
Mismatched data in "Postanski broj" and "Grad" fields in "Narudzbenica" form of the "Aktuelni broj casopisa PC" section

When default selection of "Aktuelni broj casopisa PC" is ordered, mismatched data in "Postanski broj" and "Grad" fields is entered, instead of error message is displayed, "Narudzbenica" form is opened

Sheet1.Column3: Step description
Open Google Chrome browser
Navigate to https://www.pcpress.rs/prodavnica/
Tick the checkbox next to ''Kupujem'' button in the ''Aktuelni broj časopisa PC'' section
Click on the "KUPUJEM" button in the "Aktuelni broj časopisa PC" section
In the field "Ime i Prezime" enter valid inputs (Mira Miric)
In the field "Ulica i Broj" enter valid inputs (Savski Nasip BB)
In the "Postanski broj" field enter valid inputs (11000)
In the "Grad" field enter invalid inputs (Novi Sad)
In the "Telefon" field enter valid inputs (0667654321)
In the "Email" field enter valid inputs (mika@mika.com)
Click on the light blue "Narucujem" button at the bottom of the form
